original_text: Lord, you have gone away from your people. They are Jacob's descendants. They are full of ideas from countries in the east. They use magic to learn about future times, as the Philistines do. They join hands with foreign people.
korean_text: 주께서 주의 백성 야곱 족속을 버리셨음은 그들에게 동방 풍속이 가득하며 그들이 블레셋 사람들 같이 점을 치며 이방인과 더불어 손을 잡아 언약하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Lord, you have gone away from your people.
They are full of ideas from countries in the east.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 동쪽 나라들의 생각으로 가득 차 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They use magic to learn about future times,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 미래의 시간을 알기 위해 마술을 사용하고,

sentences.original_text: They join hands with foreign people.
